form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Moran (for himself and Mr. Peters) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 11, District of Columbia Official Code, to revise references in such title to individuals with intellectual disabilities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Words Matter for the District of Columbia Courts Act.

section.header: References to individuals with intellectual disabilities

subsection.header: Jurisdiction of United States District Court
subsection.text: Section 11–501(2)(D), District of Columbia Official Code, is amended by striking substantially retarded persons and inserting persons with moderate intellectual disabilities.
Section 11–921(a)(4)(D), District of Columbia Official Code, is amended by striking substantially retarded persons and inserting persons with moderate intellectual disabilities.
Section 11–1101(a)(15), District of Columbia Official Code, is amended by striking the at least moderately mentally retarded and inserting persons with moderate intellectual disabilities.
